createDeployment: INSERT INTO deployments(projectId, status) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING *
updateDeploymentStatus: UPDATE deployments SET status = $1 WHERE id = $2
insertLogs: INSERT INTO log_events(deploymentId, logs) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING
createProject: INSERT INTO projects (id, createdBy, gitURL) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) RETURNING *
